body:
1. I was playing a map today... I think it was Battle of <something>, it's a nebula map and you start out with nothing. So today I saw SO MANY people spawn camping/killing. Just a request, should this map be removed? With the limited 10 minutes and size of map (and the fact that you start out with nothing), i don't really feel it as a Neb. Map. Also the fact that there is spawn killing.

I couldn't report anyone cause literally EVERYONE was spawn killing on my team. They also blocked the area so none of the other team could move as soon as they respawned.

#StillTryingToLearnHowToUseTSForModApps

title: Spawn Killing c:

replies.body: Heey I think it was "Battle Of Margor", but that's a nexus map. And this is a really big problem... The only thing you  can do is /report or record them and fill an forum report out. the second thing is better I think. Hope there is something that help you :D
replies.body_tagged: Heey I think it was "Battle Of Margor", but that's a nexus map. And this is a really big problem... The only thing you  can do is /report or record them and fill an forum report out. the second thing is better I think. Hope there is something that help you :D

replies.body: Ok, thanks. And I'm very sure I was playing Nebula today... 0-o

replies.body: Im the maker of BoM. First im sorry if this is happening. 1. its not TDM its suppose to be DTM. 2. The spawns are suppose to be on the boats. 3. You should start with items. Do not call it bad when its not in the right Gamemode.
replies.body_tagged: Im the maker of BoM. First im sorry if this is happening. 1. its not TDM its suppose to be DTM. 2. The spawns are suppose to be on the boats. 3. You should start with items. Do not call it bad when its not in the right Gamemode.
